Introduction
This topic contains information on the duty status and eligibility of current or former members of the National Guard, including
eligibility of National Guard personnel for compensation or pension
full-time National Guard service under 32 U.S.C.
qualifying National Guard service under 10 U.S.C.
, and
verification of full-time National Guard Service
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Establishing Veteran Status
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
